Get NFL play-by-play for a specific game from ESPN's API

Source: R/get_nfl_pbp.R
get_nfl_pbp.Rd

Get NFL play-by-play for a specific game from ESPN's API

get_nfl_pbp(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

character

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# Get NFL play-by-play for a specific game
get_nfl_pbp(game_id = "300912027")
#> # A tibble: 164 x 73
#>    game_id game_uid season season_type date   week drive_id pos_team_abb play_id
